verbs.description: [ARG0: Unofficial Donald Trump advisor Alan Dershowitz] [V: attended] [ARG1: a ceremony to open the new U.S. embassy in Jerusalem] , [ARGM-ADV: as did Jared Kushner 's lawyer Abbe Lowell] .
